title: So, This Happened: An Airline Passenger Hung Socks On Window Shutter In Order To Dry Them
text:
So, This Happened: An Airline Passenger Hung Socks On Window Shutter In Order To Dry Them

So, This Happened: An Airline Passenger Hung Socks On Window Shutter In Order To Dry Them

Finding a sane fellow passenger on an airplane seems to be a matter of luck these days. The time when crying babies were the most annoying beings on flight is gone.

Now, we have passengers who tend to open the flight door mid-air, who start a brawl in a flight, who take up more space than needed and who dry their socks on plane windows. That is correct.

It is time to get over the passenger who used their feet to operate the touch screen system on the plane, there is a new contender for the ‘most disgusting passenger’ title.

Passenger Shaming Instagram page posted an image taken by an anonymous passenger of a person using their window seat to hang up socks to dry on the shutter of the plane window.

Instagram

The image is captioned, 'Me doing my laundry on the way to LA this weekend! #multitasking', which is obviously a sarcastic comment.

One person commented, ‘That's beyond nasty!’ while another one wrote ‘Why?!? There is absolutely no justification for this’, and we agree, why would anyone want to dry their socks of all the clothes they own. Why dry clothes on airplanes at all!?

But there is no getting to know the minds of weird people, is there?
